name: Swift Attack
description:
In 2035 Insurgents Take over a middle eastern country and launch nuclear strikes on the Global Alliance Forces in the nearby countries.
You are dispatched to locate and destroy the remaining missiles before they strike again.
You face Different enemies in the deserts of the middle east.
This Game is an homage to the old third person shooters of the 90s.
The Game is made with Unreal Engine 4, It is a Military third person shooter where you fight intelligent AI that can take cover when shot at, you can pickup weapons dropped by the killed enemies, you can carry 3 weapons.
In the game you should complete missions like locating and destroying weapon caches and Missiles.
